context: Metropolis Healthcare is a diagnostic lab chain headquartered in Mumbai. As a Data Science Intern, I worked with the marketing and R&D teams to improve reporting efficiency and build an AI chatbot for diagnostic report summarization.
objectives: Developed a diagnostic report summarization and analysis system using GPT-3.5 and T5, enabling an AI chatbot to generate simplified, patient-friendly summaries.
Integrated RAG to retrieve similar medical reports, ensuring chatbot responses were aligned with clinical context.
Collaborated with the marketing team to analyze over 2 million rows of data, building automated KPI dashboards using Tableau, SQL, and Excel.
Deployed dashboards to AWS S3, reducing manual weekly reporting effort by over 12 hours.
Achieved a 20% increase in end-user feedback on report comprehension and usability.
